nodes.text: Lance Squadron was a walker-equipped squadron that was part of the Order of Revan forces during 3637 BBY. Lance Squadron Walkers patrolled the area around Revanite encampments on Yavin 4.
Lance Squadron Walkers appear in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014. Destroying all walkers is required to obtain an achievement.
